price: 44. Ken cattam matan Nanu keenih abne racmattaa kee yimixxige waktî (uddurih) fan keenit abne hatkisiyya akke waytek Nel yaduureem gidih.
arabic: إِلَّا رَحۡمَةٗ مِّنَّا وَمَتَٰعًا إِلَىٰ حِينٖ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: illā raḥmatan minnā wamatāʿan ilā ḥīnin
